Description: As a user, I want to be able to log in so that I can access my account.
As a user, I want to update my profile so that I can change my personal information.
As a user, I want to reset my password in case I forget it.
As a user, I want to view the dashboard so that I can see a summary of my activities.
As a user, I want to upload documents so that I can share files with others.
As a user, I want to download reports so that I can have offline access to my data.
As a user, I want to receive notifications so that I am informed of important events.
As a user, I want to use search functionality so that I can easily find information.
As a user, I want to be able to log out so that I can secure my account.
As a user, I want to see data visualizations so that I can understand trends at a glance.
